summary: An ordinance permitting the operation of cars by one man only, instead of by two men on each car, on that certain street railway line known as Loyal Railway Line, operated under the provisions of Ordinances Nos. 481, 1006 1101, of the former city of Ballard, and Ordinance No. 16874, of the City of Seattle.
note: Related: Ord 16874, Ballard Ord 481, Ballard Ord 1006, Ballard Ord 1101
